items.description: South Hayling and South Eastoke seafront
items.message: We are temporarily automating our messages due to industrial action. This Flood Warning was issued in error because of this automation. The risk of flooding from the coast for the next 5 days is very low. No flooding impacts are expected. If this Flood Warning is issued again during this period, it will be due to an automated error and can be ignored.

items.description: Hellifield Beck at Hellifield, around Park Place, Park Crescent, and Main Road
items.message:
Flooding is expected in this area. This means properties are at risk of flooding.
Please take action to protect yourself and your property and monitor local weather and river conditions. Avoid contact with, walking or driving through flood water. Consider activating any property flood protection products you may have.

The Environment Agency Flood Warning System has issued this message based on rising river or tidal levels.
We are temporarily automating our messages due to industrial action.
